item.title: About
item.description: Hey there: Welcome, I am Luis Vaca (squaredcow) owner and author of this blog. Once I read on LinkedIn: “If you cannot explain in five words what do you do for a living, you are probably lying”. That said, I am a programmer. Now, if I may give the verbose self-description: I am a programmer, graduated as Software Engineer, +8 years ago, focused on Web Services and Distributed Systems. I have been writing code for big-tech companies, start-ups, consultant firms and now, in this blog, for myself.

item.title: Project MRIADX-II
item.description: Before the next 90’s The lab door opens after the third beep. Piets enter the laboratory. “Morning," he says, a bit incredulous upon seeing his laboratory assistant already sit in his chair this early in the morning. As Piet approaches Bastian’s desk he notices his morning hair and the fact that he is wearing flip-flops that Bastian pulled an all-nighter here, again. “This is an unheatlhy habit, Bas”, Piet starts. “There is no need for anyone of us to stay longer than we need to," Piet continues, "".
